fields.label: Variant
fields.name: variant
fields.description: Determines the look and feel of the button.

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: size
fields.description: Text font size. It makes line height and spacing smaller as text size grows and also ensures text size is even for better layout.

fields.label: Text Transform
fields.name: textTransform
fields.description: How the text is displayed in terms of case.

fields.label: Text Decoration
fields.name: textDecoration
fields.description: How the text is decorated, like underline, overline, line-through, etc…

fields.label: Text Overflow
fields.name: textOverflow
fields.description: How the text is displayed when it overflows its container.

fields.label: Label (ARIA)
fields.name: ariaLabel
fields.description: Human readable label for the text, in event the text is not rendered.

fields.label: Level (ARIA)
fields.name: ariaLevel
fields.description: The hierarchical level of the heading within a structure, when the text represents a heading. Levels increase with depth. The value is an integer greater than or equal to 1. Leave empty if the text is not a heading.

fields.label: Default Open
fields.name: defaultOpen
fields.description: The initial open state of the dialog when rendered.

fields.label: Lazy Mount
fields.name: lazyMount
fields.description: Mount the dialog only when it is open.

fields.name: ariaLabel
fields.description: Human readable label for the dialog, in event the dialog title is not rendered.

fields.label: Direction
fields.name: direction
fields.description: An alias for the css `flex-direction` property. Default is `column`.

fields.label: Gap
fields.name: gap
fields.description: The gap between the elements in the stack.

fields.label: Align
fields.name: align
fields.description: An alias for the css `align-items` property.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.description: The background color of the stack.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.description: The background image of the stack.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
